The user may make a Suppress power check along with an opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check targeting another Force user within short range. If the user spends :ldsp: :ldsp: and succeeds on the check, the targeted Force user immediately uncommits all :wh: and ends all ongoing effects of Force powers and Force talents that required committed :wh:.

Spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to have the bonuses the power grants apply to all checks for rounds equal to Duration upgrades purchased.
When performing Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, spend :ldsp: to add :adv: on user’s first check this encounter.
When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, spend :ldsp: to add :suc: or :adv: to ally’s first check this encounter.
Spend :ldsp: :ldsp: to add :bl: equal to Strength upgrades purchased to user’s next check against the target.

When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, if the user did not use :dsp: to generate :ldsp:, each ally adds automatic :suc: to the results of his Initiative check. If the user used :dsp: to generate :ldsp:, the user may immediately perform an action before the encounter begins, but each enemy in the encounter adds automatic :suc: to the results of his Initiative check.
